changeSet.author: fago
changeSet.sql: update JOB_ADVERTISEMENT set DISPLAY_APPLY_CHANNEL_MAIL_ADDRESS = APPLY_CHANNEL_MAIL_ADDRESS, DISPLAY_APPLY_CHANNEL_EMAIL_ADDRESS = APPLY_CHANNEL_EMAIL_ADDRESS, DISPLAY_APPLY_CHANNEL_PHONE_NUMBER = APPLY_CHANNEL_PHONE_NUMBER, DISPLAY_APPLY_CHANNEL_FORM_URL = APPLY_CHANNEL_FORM_URL, DISPLAY_APPLY_CHANNEL_ADDITIONAL_INFO = APPLY_CHANNEL_ADDITIONAL_INFO WHERE publication_company_anonymous = 'FALSE'
